response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its true worth to be $12,000. However, to facilitate a transaction and considering the current market conditions, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate, tailored specifically for discerning buyers like yourself. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 11000}
